entry.title: $2250 // Entire 2nd floor of a 1800's Brooklyn Townhouse
entry.content:
ABOUT THIS LISTING
The property, coined The Republican Women's Clubhouse, was built to entertain the political elite in the 1850s. Today, it is divided into three separate apartments and houses the finest folk in Brooklyn.

The second floor will be available from September 1, 2018. It has separate entrance, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a kitchen. The rooms are the biggest I've seen in Brooklyn. The master fits a queen size bed, dining table, couch and TV (please see pictures). Both rooms have two walk-in closets.

ABOUT THIS LISTER
I purchased the house a few years ago, and live on the first floor. The current tenants are wonderful, take care of the house and of each other. Finding the right fit is a priority.

RENTAL REQUIREMENTS
All applicants need proof of income, good credit, and must supply bank statements. First and last month's rent, as well as a security deposit is required.
